医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
政府推出 6 亿英镑一揽子计划，帮助社会护理人员招聘政府今天公布了一项 6 亿英镑的一揽子计划，以帮助社会护理人员的招聘和保留。该基金将支持社会护理人员并提高社会护理能力，从而在冬季之前和明年为国民医疗服务体系（NHS）提供支持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Government-unveils-a-c2a3600-million-package-to-help-with-recruitment-in-social-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Government-unveils-a-c2a3600-million-package-to-help-with-recruitment-in-social-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bec29826-59df-46ed-9f5b-c457e094bf2b Fri, 28 Jul 2023 08:28:00 -0400 Government unveils a £600 million package to help with recruitment in social care
研究分析了濒死体验和迷幻体验之间的相似之处研究人员分析了昏迷时的濒死体验（NDE）与迷幻药物引起的体验之间的异同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-analyzes-the-similarities- Between-near-death-experiences-and-psychedelic-experiences.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-analyzes-the-similarities- Between-near-death-experiences-and-psychedelic-experiences.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e21da5a-cba4-4a52-a749-6ce2ab88729d Fri, 28 Jul 2023 07:37:39 -0400 Study analyzes the similarities between near-death experiences and psychedelic experiences
德克萨斯州活动人士渴望制定国家热量标准以保护户外工人建筑工人、机场行李搬运工、邮递员和其他户外工人——其中许多人是从德克萨斯州前往华盛顿特区——周二聚集在国会大厦的台阶上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Texan-activists-thirst-for-a-national-heat-standard-to-protect-outdoor-workers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Texan-activists-thirst-for-a-national-heat-standard-to-protect-outdoor-workers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23226b9c-d363-4574-a371-bb8687f0109b Fri, 28 Jul 2023 06:53:50 -0400 Texan activists thirst for a national heat standard to protect outdoor workers
在威斯康星州，妇女的医疗保健受到 1849 年法律的限制。这些医生都惊呆了。在一个繁忙的午餐地点，三个女人围坐在一张桌子旁，有着一种严峻的友情。威斯康星州将堕胎定为刑事犯罪的 1849 年法律重新生效已经一年多了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/In-Wisconsin-womene28099s-health-care-is-constricted-by-an-1849-law-These-doctors-are-aghast.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/In-Wisconsin-womene28099s-health-care-is-constricted-by-an-1849-law-These-doctors-are-aghast.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=165bcfe1-5d12-40e2-a1e0-33af1e0688e3 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 06:49:32 -0400 In Wisconsin, women’s health care is constricted by an 1849 law. These doctors are aghast.
他的麻醉医生迟迟未向他收取医疗保险费用。他被送去收款 3,000 美元。托马斯·格林的右腿一直感到疼痛，这是糖尿病的并发症，医生建议采取手术来增加肢体的血流量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/His-anesthesia-provider-billed-medicare-late-He-got-sent-to-collections-for-the-243000-tab.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/His-anesthesia-provider-billed-medicare-late-He-got-sent-to-collections-for-the-243000-tab.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9f710590-1c3a-4e5f-b5a5-882561d78a64 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 06:48:21 -0400 His anesthesia provider billed medicare late. He got sent to collections for the $3,000 tab.
研究发现体育活动可以改善青少年的学习和健康东芬兰大学领导的一项研究表明，经常参加学校交通和休闲体育活动的青少年在中学时的表现比不活跃的同龄人更好。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Physical-activity-can-improve-learning-and-wellbeing-in-adolescents-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Physical-activity-can-improve-learning-and-wellbeing-in-adolescents-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6ac72b5d-c96a-43f9-bf4c-7ac83a4a3bdb Fri, 28 Jul 2023 03:02:00 -0400 Physical activity can improve learning and wellbeing in adolescents, study finds
专家警告欧洲假期风险增加随着英国健康安全局（UKHSA）为出国旅行者发布新的基本健康指南，一位领先的检测专家警告欧洲假期的风险不断增加。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Expert-warns-of-the-increasing-risks-of-European-holidays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Expert-warns-of-the-increasing-risks-of-European-holidays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d53b7c2c-31f9-456c-93b2-cb27778bf8f​​8 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 03:00:00 -0400 Expert warns of the increasing risks of European holidays
研究揭示了澳大利亚人为解决超重和肥胖问题而实际增加的体重毫无疑问，澳大利亚人喜欢盛大的庆祝活动。一到周末我们就会全身心投入，大多数人都无法在没有一点过度放纵的情况下度过圣诞节庆祝活动。但这一切都是有代价的，它对我们的腰围造成了巨大的损失。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-exposes-the-real-weight-gains-of-Australians-to-tackle-overweight-and-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Study-exposes-the-real-weight-gains-of-Australians-to-tackle-overweight-and-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=017bc038-50a7-4f64-b527-5b8c2e426af4 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:59:00 -0400 Study exposes the real weight gains of Australians to tackle overweight and obesity
新的 3900 万美元政府资金用于改善艾滋病毒治疗的可及性在联邦政府投资 3900 万美元后，没有医疗保险的人现在可以获得政府资助的艾滋病毒治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-2439-million-government-funding-to-improve-access-to-HIV-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/New-2439-million-government-funding-to-improve-access-to-HIV-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1e91f64-29c0-45c2-9b10-7ce32dcebae3 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:56:00 -0400 New $39 million government funding to improve access to HIV treatment
增强的光敏感性可能会加重阿尔茨海默氏症的症状UVA Health 的新阿尔茨海默氏症研究表明，光敏感性的增强可能会导致“日落”（一天晚些时候症状恶化），并刺激睡眠中断，这被认为会导致疾病的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Enhanced-light-sensitivity-may-worsen-Alzheimers-symptoms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Enhanced-light-sensitivity-may-worsen-Alzheimers-symptoms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=be5f5b7e-ef23-4e65-9fce-8df1e84cc4fb Fri, 28 Jul 2023 02:53:00 -0400 Enhanced light sensitivity may worsen Alzheimer's symptoms
